src: "Nyalo sesinemagundvwane lanetinyanga letine budzala lasekete shukela labekanawo shukela", wangeta.
mt: "I'm not sure how many years I've been doing this," he said.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: Dkt. Ehud Ur, solwati wetemphilo eNyuvesi yaseDalhousie eHalifax, Nova Scotia kanye nasihlalo wetemphilo nenhlangano yesayensi yeNhlangano Yelabanesifo Sashukela yaseCanada wacaphelisa ngekutsi loluphenyo lusasemalangeni alo ekucala.
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, a professor at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, and a member of the Canadian Academy of Health Sciences, says the study is flawed.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Njengabo bonkhe bonjingalwati, abetsembi kahle kutsi sifo sashukela singelashwa, kucaphela kutsi lokutfoliwe akuhlobani nebantfu lasebane Neluhlobo 1 lwesifo sashukela.
mt: As with all accidents, the cause of the crash is under investigation, but it is believed that the pilot was killed instantly.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: NgeMsombuluko, Sara Danius, mabhalane wasikhatsi sonkhe weliKomidi iNobel leteKubhala kuleSwedish Academy, wamemetela kuwowonkhe nakuchubeka luhlelo lwerediyo kusiteshi iSveriges Radio eSweden lekomidi, ingakhoni kuchumana na-Bob Dylan ngalokucondzile mayelana nekuwina leNobel Prize yetekubhala ya-2016, yayekela imetamo yekuchumana naye.
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Swedish Academy, which awards the Nobel Prize in Literature, announced that Bob Dylan had declined the 2016 prize, saying he was "embarrassed" by the honor.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: Danius watsi, "Akukho lesikwentako nyalo, ngishayele ngaphindze ngatfumela ema-imeyile kubo bonkhe lesisebentisana nabo edvute ngatfola timphendvulo letinebungani. Kwanyalo, loko kuphela kwanele."
mt: "There is no official statement yet, but I can confirm that the plane has crashed. There is no official statement yet, but I can confirm that the plane has crashed."
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Esikhatsini lesendlulile, CEO weRing's, Jamie Siminoff, watsi lenkapane yacala ngesikhatsi insimbi lesemnyango wakhe bewungavakali kahle umsindvo wayo esitolo sakhe nawusegaraji.
mt: In a statement, Ring's CEO Jamie Siminoff said the company was "deeply saddened" by the death of its founder and was "working closely with local law enforcement" to investigate the incident.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: Utsi wakhe ibheli ye-WiFi yasemnyango.
mt: 1. He has a WiFi router at home.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Siminoff utsi kutsengiswa kukhuphukile ngemuva kwekuvela kwakhe nga-2013 eluhlelweni lolutsi Shark Tank lapho loluhlelo belukhuluma ngekwehla lobekubonake ekusekeleni.
mt: 2013, he appeared on Shark Tank, where the show discussed his idea for a smart lock that could be unlocked by a smartphone.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: Ngasekupheleni kwa-2017, Siminoff savela esikhangisweni lesikumabonakudze esiteshini i-QVC.
mt: 2017, Siminoff was inducted into the Consumer Electronics Hall of Fame.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: IRing iphindze yalilungisa licala nenkapane yabogadzi, i-ADT Corparation.
mt: 1. The fire truck was responding to a call from the airport's ADT Corporation.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Ngisho noma umjovo lophasisiwe kubonakala ukhona kunciphisa linani lebantfu lababulawa yi-Ebola, kuze kube ngunyalo, akukho lokutsite lokukhona kwekwelapha bantfu labangenwe ngulesifo.
mt: The Ebola outbreak has been declared over in Liberia, but the country is still on high alert for the virus, which can be spread by people who have not been infected.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: Yinye i-cocktail yemasotja emtimba, iZMapp, kwekucala yaniketa litsemba kulendzima, kepha tifundvo letihlelekile takhomba kutsi inelusito loluncane kunalokudzingekile kuvimbela kufa.
mt: A cocktail of drugs in the experimental ZMapp treatment has been shown to reduce the amount of virus in the blood, but the trial was halted after it appeared to have accelerated the death of some patients.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: Kuloluhlolo i-PALM, ZMapp yasetjentiswa ngenjongo yekucodzisa, lokusho kutsi bososayensi bayisebentisa njengesisekelo futsi bacatsanisa naleti letinye tindlela letintsatfu tekwelapha.
mt: The PALM and ZMapp are being used as experimental treatments, with scientists saying they are hopeful and are exploring other possible treatment options.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: BeTekujima eMelika basekela lencwadzi yeKomidi yema-Olimpiki yaseMelika futsi bamukela lesidzingo salomndeni wema-Olimpiki kutfutfukisa simo lesiphephile sabo bonkhe badlali.
mt: The United States Olympic Committee has been accused of covering up a sexual abuse scandal involving a former Olympic gymnastics coach.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Siyavumelana nalokushiwo yi-USOC kutsi tifiso tebadlali betfu nemacembu, nemdlalo wabo, tingagcwaliseka kahle ngekuchubekela phambili ngelushintjo loluvakalako kulenhlangano, hhayi nje kunconyelwa.
mt: The USOC says the athletes' behavior, their conduct and their actions, must be in line with the Olympic spirit, not just in the competition, but also in the way they conduct themselves in the world.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: BeTekujima eMelika basekela luphenyo lolutimele lelingakhanyisa kutsi kuhlukubeteka kwalendlela lechazwe nguletisulu taLarry Nassar ngabe akubonwanga sikhatsi lesidze kangaka futsi iyalamukela noma ngabe nguluphi lushintjo lolufanele naloludzingekako.
mt: 7 U.S. senators are calling for an investigation into the FBI's handling of the Larry Nassar sexual abuse case, saying the agency failed to act on a tip about the former USA Gymnastics team doctor in 2015.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: Betemdlalo wemagymnastics baseMelika kanye neUSOC banemgomomunye wekwenta lomdlalo naleminye uphephe kuze bantfu labawudlalako baphephe bakhone kufeza emaphupho abo.
mt: 2012 U.S. Olympic gymnastics team member McKayla Maroney has a fractured rib and will not compete in the team event.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal â€” making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Emnyakeni wonkhe wa-1960, Brzezinski bekasebentela John F. Kennedy njengemeluleki wakhe wase usebentela lihhovisi laLyndon B. Johnson.
mt: 1960, Brzezinski served as an adviser to John F. Kennedy and later to Lyndon B. Johnson.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: Phakatsi nelukhetfo lwanga-1976 wacebisa Carter ngemtsetfo lophatselene nemave angaphandle, wabese wasebenta njengaMeluleki Wetekuvikela Telive (NSA) kusuka nga-1977 kuya nga-1981, endlula Henry Kissinger.
mt: 1976, Carter was appointed head of the National Security Agency, a position he held until 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: Njenge-NSA, usite Carter ngekubamba tindzaba temave, letifana ne-Camp David Accords, yanga-1978; wenta simo sahlaliseka emkhatsini weMelika neShayina ngasekupheleni kweminyaka yanga-1970; i-Iranian Revolution, leyaletsa simo se-Iran sekutfumba, nga-1979; nekungena kwe-Soviet e-Afghanistan, nga-1979.
mt: 1970s events include the Watergate scandal, which led to the resignation of President Richard Nixon; the Camp David Accords, which led to the 1978 peace treaty between Israel and Egypt; the Iranian Revolution, which overthrew the Shah of Iran and led to the establishment of an Islamic republic, in 1979; and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan, in 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing USâ€“China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Lelifilimu, lelifaka ekhatsi Ryan Gosling na-Emma Stone, litfole kubalelwa kuto tonkhe tindzima letivelele.
mt: 2016's La La Land, starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, is nominated for 14 Oscars.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Gosling naStone banconyelwe kuba Badlali Baseshashalazini Labahamba Phambili ngekulandzelana kwabo.
mt: Gosling and Stone were both arrested for allegedly assaulting a police officer.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: Lokunconywa kufaka ekhatsi kunconyelwa Sitfombe Lesihle, Umcondzisi, Umtsebuli Wetitfombe, Umtfungi Wetiphahla, Umhleli Welifilimu, Umbhali Wemagama Emculo, Umhlami Wemikhicito, Umhleli Wemsindvo, Umhlanganisi Wemsindvo kanye nekuba Ngumbhali Waloko Lokutasetjentiswa Efilimini.
mt: 1. The Director, 2. The Deputy Director, 3. The Deputy Director, 4. The Director of Film, 5. The Director of Music, 6. The Director of Music, 7. The Director of Music, 8. The Director of Music, 9. The Director of Music, 10. The Director of Music, 11. The Director of Music, 12. The Director of Music, 13. The Director of Music, 14. The Director of Music, 15. The Director of Music, 16. The Director of Music, 17. The Director of Music, 18. The Director of Music, 19. The Director of Music, 20. The Director of Music, 21. The Director of Music, 22. The Director of Music, 23. The Director of Music, 24. The Director of Music, 25. The Director of Music, 26. The Director of Music, 27. The Director of Music, 28. The Director of Music, 29. The Director of Music, 37. The Director of Music, 38. The Director of Music, 39. The Director of Music, 40. The Director of Music, 41. The Director of Music, 42. The Director of Music, 43. The Director of Music, 44. The Director of Music, 45. The Director of Music, 46. The Director of Music, 47. The Director of Music, 48. The Director of Music, 49. The Director of Music, 50. The Director of Music, 51. The Director of Music, 52. The Director of Music, 53. The Director of Music, 54. The Director of Music, 55. The Director of Music, 56. The Director of Music, 57. The Director of Music, 58. The Director of Music, 59. The Director of Music, 60. The Director of Music, 61. The Director of Music, 62. The Director of Music, 63. The Director of Music, 64. The Director of Music, 65. The Director
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: Tingoma letimbili kulefilimi, i-Audition (Letilima LetiPhuphako) kanye ne-City of Stars, taphakanyiswa ehlangotsini letingoma tekuticambela letihambe embili. Situdiyo iLionsgate yatfola tiphakamiso letingema-26 - kwendlula noma ngutiphi letinye titudiyo.
mt: 2016 Golden Globe nominees for Best Original Song, "Audition (The Fools Who Dream)" and "City of Stars," were announced this morning. Lionsgate has released the first trailer for the film, which will be released on December 9.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations â€” more than any other studio.

src: NgeLisontfo ntsambama, mengameli waseMelika Donald Trump, esitatimendeni lasetfule ngamabhalane wemaphepha, ubike kutsi emasotja ase-US atawusuka eSyiria.
mt: In a speech to the United Nations General Assembly, U.S. President Donald Trump said American troops would be leaving Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: Simemetelo sentiwe ngemuva kwekutsi Trump abe nengcogco ngefoni naMongameli waseTurkey, Recep Tayyip Erdogan.
mt: Trump has been in contact with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan since the attack.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip ErdoÄŸan.

src: I-Turkey ingatsatsa kugadza bantfu labalwela i-ISIS lababanjiwe, lombiko washo, emave eYurophu alile kubuya.
mt: Turkey is sending troops to fight ISIS, the first country to do so, and the first country to be attacked by ISIS.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Loku akucinisekisi nje kuphela kutsi emadayinosa anetinsiba, inkholelo leyandzile, kodvwa iniketa imininingwane ngetinsalele, kufaka ekhatsi imibala neluhlelo lwetincenye letintsatfu.
mt: The report only said that the plane was on a training mission, but it did not specify the type of aircraft, the number of crew members or the number of passengers.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: . Bososayensi batsi tinsiba talesilwane betinsundvu etulu bese siba nembala lophaphatsekile emaceleni.
mt: . Researchers say the new technology could be used to detect cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria in the blood.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: Lolokutfolakele kuniketa kucondza kwekushintjashintja kwetimphiko tetinyoni.
mt: 2 people were killed in a car accident.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Ngenca yokutsi timphiko temadayinasosi atinayolendzawo lecijile lekhule ngalokwanele, lebitwa ngekutsi i-rachis, kodvwa inato letinye tintfo tetimphiko â€” ema-barbs nema-barbules â€” baphenyi baphetse ngekutsi ema-rachis ete kamuva kunaleti letinye tintfo.
mt: The spinal cord is a bundle of nerves that runs from the brain to the lower back. It is protected by the vertebrae, the bones that make up the spine. The spinal cord is not the same as the spinal column, which is made up of the vertebrae and the discs between them. The spinal cord is protected by the vertebrae, the bones that make up the spine. The spinal cord is not the same as the spinal column, which is made up of the vertebrae and the discs between them.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers â€” barbs and barbules â€” the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: Lokubukeka kwaletimphaphe kuchaza kutsi atisetjentiswanga endizeni kodvwa kulawula lizinga lekushisa noma kukhombisa. Labahloli basikisela kutsi, noma loku kuyindzaba yedayinasosi lencane, lesampula ikhombisa kukhuluphala kwalendzala hhayi kwenkhukhu ngephansi.
mt: The crash was not immediately confirmed by the military, which said it was investigating the incident. However, local media reported that the plane was on a training mission and that the pilot was the only person on board.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Bacwaningi batsi, ngisho loku kungumsila wedayinaso, loku labakutfolile kukhombisa kutsi letimphiko tenyoni lendzala hhayi lencane.
mt: Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Ibhomu yemoto lebeyentelwe kuchumisa indlunkhulu yemaphoyisa eGaziantep eTurkey itolo ekuseni, ibulele emaphoyisa lamabili yalimata bantfu labangetulu kwemashumi lamabili.
mt: 12 people were killed in a car bomb explosion in Gaziantep, Turkey, this morning, according to local media.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: Lihhovisi lalombusi litse labalishumi nemfica balabalimele bekumaphoyisa.
mt: 10 people were injured in a bus accident.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: Emaphoyisa atsi asola kutsi libutfo leDaesh (ISIL) leli lelihlasele.
mt: Police say the Daesh (ISIL) group is responsible.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Batfola kutsi Lilanga lisebenta ngendlela lefanako naletinye tinkhanyeti: Kuhamba kwato tonkhe tinkhanyeti esibhakabhakeni kwatfolakala kutsi kuchutjwa kukhanya, kutungelete, futsi kute lokunye.
mt: 1. The pilot was not wearing a parachute. 2. The pilot was not wearing a helmet. 3. The pilot was not wearing a life vest.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: Kukhanya nekutungeleta kusetjentiswa kanyekanye kutfola inombolo yeRossby yenkhanyeti, lehlobene nekugeleta kwe-plasma.
mt: The discovery of the Rossby gyres, named after Carl-Gustaf Rossby, is credited with the discovery of the plasma.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: Nangabe inombolo yeRossby iyincane, inkhanyeti ayibi nemandla kangako ngalokuhambisana ne-magnetic.
mt: When the Rossby number is small, the flow is dominated by the Coriolis force.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Phakatsi neluhambo lwakhe, Lwasaki watifaka enkhingeni etigamekweni letinyenti.
mt: 2nd Lt. Lwasaki was the first to be buried.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: Wabanjwa inkunzi baphangi, wahlaselwa yinja lenelulaka eTibet, wabalekela umshado eNepal futsi waboshwa eNdiya.
mt: 1. A tiger was killed in Tibet, a leopard was killed in Nepal and a bear was killed in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Le-802.11n levamile isebenta kuwo omabili emafrikhwensi e-2.4Ghz ne-5.0Ghz.
mt: 802.11n is available in two frequency bands, 2.4 GHz and 5.0 GHz.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Loku kutayivumela kutsi isebentisane ne-802.11a, 802.11b kanye ne-802.11g, kulandzela kutsi siteshi lesiyinhloko sinemisakato lemibili.
mt: 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g are all supported, but the main focus is on 802.11n.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: Litubane lelingu-802.11n likhulu kakhulu kunalelo lelililandzelako lelingu-600Mbit/s.
mt: 802.11n is the fastest wireless standard, with speeds up to 600 Mbit/s.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Duvall, loganile futsi lonebantfwana lababili lasebakhulile, akamshiyelanga sitfombe lesikhulu langabukela kuso Miller, nokunguye lendzaba lecondzene naye.
mt: Duvall, who was also a father of two, was found dead in his home, according to Miller, who said he had no other information about the death.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: Nabamcela asho lokutsite, Miller watsi, "Mike ukhuluma kakhulu nakuchubeka lelicala...bengitilungiselela ngako-ke angivanga kahle kutsi bekatsini".
mt: "Mike was talking a lot and moving around a lot...we were trying to calm him down," Miller said.
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: "Sitozama kunciphisa kukhicitwa kwe-carbon dioxide ngeyunithi ye-GDP ngelizinga lelinakekako nga-2020 kusukela kulelizinga la-2005" Hu washo.
mt: "We are not satisfied with the progress in reducing carbon dioxide emissions relative to GDP growth from 2005 to 2020," Hu said.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: Akasho kutsi kutawehla kangakanani kodvwa utse kutawuya ngekutsi umnotfo waseShayina ume njani.
mt: 1. What is the name of the pilot? 2. What is the name of the pilot's wife?
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Hu wakhutsata emave latfutfukako "kutsi agweme lendlela lendzala yekungcolisa kucala bese ayakhuculula kuhlobisa ngekuhamba kwesikhatsi."
mt: "It's not clear how the plane ended up in the water, but it appears to have been trying to land," the official said.
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: Wengete watsi "akukafaneli bacelwe kutsi batsatse sibopho lesingetulu kwemandla abo, imitfwalo yabo nemakhono."
mt: "We can't say for sure if they were killed by the fire or the explosion, but their bodies were badly burned and disfigured."
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: Lelicembu lebacwaningi lase-Iraq letfule umbiko walo namuhla nga-12.00 GMT.
mt: 12:00 GMT today, the Iraqi government announced the death of its leader.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: Yecwayisa ngekutsi kute lokucinisekisa kutsi loko lokubangele imphi e-Iraq kutawuphela, budlova lobukhulako nome ludlame.
mt: 2 U.S. soldiers were killed in Iraq, bringing the total number of U.S. military deaths in Iraq to 4,000.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: Lombiko uvula ngesicelo semphikiswano lokufanele yentiwe ebaleni futsi kwakhiwe sivumelwano eMelika ngenchubomgomo ngalokuphatselene neMphumalanga Lesekhatsi.
mt: The crash is being investigated by the U.S. Federal Aviation Administration and the Thai Department of Civil Aviation.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: Lombiko ubaluleke kakhulu kuto tonkhe tinhlangotsi talenchubomgomo Yebaphatsi ngalokuphatselene ne-Iraq futsi ufuna kutsi kube nelushintjo loluphutfumako.
mt: The crash is being investigated by the Thai military, which has a history of air accidents.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: Kwekucala kuletincomo tayo letingu-78 kutsi intfo lensha lokufanele yentiwe ngaphamphi kwekutsi lomnyaka uphele kuvikela emagede langena e-Iraq kubantfu labaneludlame futsi kuphindze kusungulwe buhlobo lobusha nemave labomakhelwane bayo.
mt: 78 people were killed when a bomb exploded in a market in the Iraqi city of Ramadi, and the number of casualties is expected to rise as the death toll is still being counted.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraqâ€™s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Sisebenti sahulumende sanyalo kanye Nendlovukazi yase-Argentine, Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner umemetele kukhankasela kwakhe sikhudla sekuba ngumengameli itolo nakuhwalala eLa Plata, lidolobha lelichele ngemakhilomitha langu-50 (emamayela langu-31) eBuenos Aires.
mt: The Argentine government and President Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner have announced the cancellation of a planned visit to La Plata, a city about 50 miles (80 km) from Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: Mrs. Kirchner utfule inhloso yakhe yekungenela kuba ngumongameli e-Argentine Theatre, indzawo layisebentisa ngesikhatsi acala umkhankaso wakhe wanga-2005 wekuba yi-Senate njengelilunga lesifundza leBuenos Aires.
mt: Mrs. Kirchner was sworn in as the first female president of the Argentine Theatre, the country's national legislature, in 2005 after winning a Senate seat in Buenos Aires.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Lemphikiswano yasuswa kuphikisana mayelana nekucitsa timali ekusiteni nasekwakheni kabusha uma kuhlasela Siphepho Katrina; loku labanye labangafuni kudlajatiswe timali labakubita ngekutsi: "Sivumelwane saBush neNew Orleans."
mt: The storm was blamed for the deaths of 1,836 people in the United States, mostly in New Orleans, Louisiana, where the levee system catastrophically failed.
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: Kusolwa lokubanti ngemitamo yekwakha kabusha igcile ngekuniketa ngetinkontileka tekwakha kabusha kulabo lababukile labangekhetsi eWashington.
mt: 2 people were killed in a car crash in Washington state.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Bantfu labangetulu kwetigidzi letine baya eRoma kuya kulomngcwabo.
mt: 1000s of protesters marched in Rome to demand the government do more to help the poor.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: Linani lebantfu labebakhona belilikhulu kakhulu kangangekutsi bekungeke kwenteke kutsi wonkhe umuntfu akhone kungena kulomngcwabo eSt. Peter's Square.
mt: 250,000 people are expected to attend the event, which is being held in St. Peter's Square.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Bomabonakudze labanyenti labakhulu bafakiwe etindzaweni letinyenti taseRoma kuze bantfu babukele lombutsano.
mt: 10,000 people are expected to attend the funeral of the 11 victims of the Rome bus crash.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: Emadolobheni lamanyenti aseTaliyane nasemhlabeni wonkhe, ikakhulukati ePoland, tindlela letifanako tentiwa, lebetibukelwa bantfu labanyenti.
mt: In Poland and other European countries, the number of people with HIV has increased, according to the World Health Organization.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Betemlandvo bagceke tinchubo teFBI takadzeni tekusebentisa tintfo netimali kakhulu ekunakeni emacala lalula kuwacatulula, kakhulu emacala etimoto letetjiwe, ngemgomo wekukhulisa lizinga lekuphumelela lalenhlangano.
mt: FBI agents are searching for a suspect who is believed to have stolen a large amount of cash from a bank, possibly a teller's drawer, in a robbery that occurred late last night.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: ICongress yacala kunikelela kucaliswa kwemanyala ngetimali tahulumende tanga-2005 futsi yacacisa kutsi i-FBI kufanele inikele ngebameleli labangu-10 etitfombeni letigcolile tebulili.
mt: 2005 legislation was passed and the FBI was required to report on the number of times it had used the Patriot Act's controversial "roving wiretap" provision.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Robin Uthappa wente ema-innings laphakeme, waba nema-runs langu-70 emabholeni langu-41 washaya ka-11 emahlandla lamane nema-6 lamabili.
mt: 41-year-old Robin Uthappa went out for 70 runs in 41 balls, hitting 11 fours and 6 sixes.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: IBatsmen yesemkhatsini, Sachin Tendulkar naRahul Dravid, badlale kahle benta emasubatfo lalikhulu.
mt: 2 of the 3 batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, were out quickly.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Kodvwa, emuva kwekulahlekelwa ngema-wicket kukaputeni waseNdiya wenta ema-runs langu-36 walahlekelwa ema-wickets langu-7 ngasekupheleni kwema-innings.
mt: 36 runs were scored in the first innings, but 7 wickets fell in the second.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: Mengameli waseMelika George W. Bush ufike eSingapore ngeLweti mhlaka-16 ekuseni, acalisa kuvakasha kwakhe eveni lase-Asia lokutawutsatsa liviki lonkhe.
mt: 16th President of the United States George W. Bush arrived in Singapore on Sunday, to begin a week-long tour of Asia to strengthen ties with the region.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: Wavuselwa Lisekela laNdvunankhulu waseSingapore Wong Kan Seng futsi bacocisana ngetindzaba tekutsengiselana netebuphekula naNdvunankhulu waseSingapore Lee Hsien Loong.
mt: Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong and his predecessor Goh Chok Tong were among those who attended the funeral.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Ngemuva kweliviki ehlulekile elukhetfweni, Bush utjele labebamlalele ngekwenwetjwa kwetentsengiselwano e-Asia.
mt: After the failed coup, Bush met with leaders of the failed coup in Asia.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Ndvunankhulu Stephen Harper uvumile kutfumela umtsetfo wahulumende lotsi 'Clean Air Act' ekomidini kuze iwubuyekete, ngaphambi kwekutsi ufundvwe lihlandla lesibili, ngemuva kwemhlangano wemizuzu lengu-25 wangaLesibili nemholi we-NDP Jack Layton e-PMO.
mt: Prime Minister Stephen Harper is expected to announce a new "Clean Air Act" in the coming days, before the House of Commons rises for the summer, according to sources close to the Prime Minister's Office.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: Layton ucele lushintjo ngesikwelede etintfweni letiphatselene nelushitjo kutemvelo kumhlangano ne-PM, wacela "kutsi kucedvwe kubhala kabusha" Lushintjo kulephathi ngesikwelede setemvelo.
mt: Layton said the "sudden" death of the PM was "a shock" to him. He said he had been in contact with the PM on the day of his death.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Kusukela Hulumende weFederal wacala kusekela ngekwetimali sibhedlela saseMersey eDevonport, Tasmania, hulumende lobusako kanye nemalunga asephalamende asigceka lesento atsi sitawuphazamisa lukhetfo loluseta ngaNovember.
mt: The Federal Government has announced a $1.5 billion shipbuilding program for the Mersey class of ships at the Devonport shipyard, Tasmania, with the first ship to be delivered by November.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Kepha Ndvunankhulu John Howard utsite lesento bekungesekuvikela sakhiwo sasesibhedlela ekutsini singehliselwa esigabeni lesiphansi nguhulumende waseTasmanian, ngekukhipha tigidzi temadola letingu-AUD$45.
mt: Prime Minister John Howard has announced a new tax break for small businesses, which will be exempt from the GST on goods and services purchased for less than AUD$45.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: Ngekusho kwetindzaba takamuva, lokufundvwako kwaselwandle kukhombisa kutsi i-tsunami yakhiwa. Kunetento tetsunami letarekhodwa eceleni kwasePago nase Niue.
mt: According to later reports, the tsunami was caused by an undersea landslide. A tsunami warning was issued for Pago Pago and Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Kute umonakalo lomkhulu noma kulimala lokubikiwe eTonga, kepha gesi wahamba kwesikhashana, lokwavimbela tiphatsimandla taseTonga kutsi tive lesicwayiso setsunami lesakhishwa yiPTWC.
mt: 7.0 magnitude earthquake in Tonga, but no tsunami warning issued by PTWC.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Kusukela ngaLesitsatfu tonke tikolwa letilishumi nakune letiseHawaii nalesiteceleni kwelwandle tavalwa noma sekutsiwe setingavulwa.
mt: 4 people were killed and 10 others were injured when a tsunami hit Hawaii and the surrounding islands.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Mengameli weMelika George W. Bush usemukele lesimemetelo.
mt: 2001 Nobel Peace Prize winner George W. Bush is in the hospital.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Lokhulumela iBush, Gordon Johndroe ubite kutibandzakanya kweNyakatfo Koriya ngekutsi "sinyatselo lesikhulu lesiyisa ekufinyeleleni umgomo wekususa emandla enyukliya etindzaweni letizungezwe ngemanti taseKoriya."
mt: White House spokesman Gordon Johndroe said the U.S. was "deeply concerned" about the situation and was "working with the South Korean government to try to resolve this peacefully."
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: Siphepho selishumi sase-Atlantic Hurricane, Subtropical Storm Jerry, sakheka e-Atlantic Ocean lamuhla.
mt: 5th Atlantic Hurricane, Subtropical Storm Jerry, forms in Atlantic Ocean today.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: Sikhungo seTiphepho saVelonkhe (iNHC) itsi kungumanje Jerry akasilo luhlupho kufika.
mt: The National Hurricane Center is tracking Jerry, which is expected to become a hurricane.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: Emabutfo Abonjinyela e-U.S asola kutsi imvula lengu-6 wemasentimitha ingawendlula umonokalo lowentiwa ngulena lenye.
mt: 6 inches of snow fell in the U.S. state of New York, causing a travel ban.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: I-Ninth Ward, lebhekene nesikhukhula lesingetulu kwetinyatselo letingu-20 ngesikhatsi kuchubeka Sikhukhula iKatrina, njengamanje inemanti lafika elukhalweni njengoba lelidamu lelisedvute lagcwala laphuphutela.
mt: 20 years after the devastation of Hurricane Katrina, the Ninth Ward is still largely abandoned as many of the residents who fled the storm have not returned.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: Emanti agcwele ayacitseka kulelidamu esigabeni lesingu-100 feet bubanti.
mt: 100 feet above the ground.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Umlawuli WeCommons Adma Cuerden uvete kukhatsateka kwakhe ngekusulwa ngesikhatsi ekhuluma neWikinews ngenyanga leyengcile.
mt: Wikimedia Commons administrator Adma Cuerden was interviewed by Wikinews last month.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: "Yena [Wales] kalula-nje wacamba emanga kwasekucaleni. Kwekucala, ngekwenta ngatsi loku bekungenca yetizatfu letingekwemtsetfo. Kwesibili, ngekwenta ngatsi uyasilalela, kuchubeke kuze kube kukhokhwa kwakhe ebucikweni."
mt: "He [Wales] is a very good player. First, he is a very good player. Second, he is a very good player, and he is a very good player."
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: Kudzineka kwalomphakatsi kuholele emitamweni leyentiwako nyalo yekubhala umtsetfo mayelana netitfo letiphatselene netemacansi kulewebusayithi lesentjentiswa tigidzi tawonkhewonkhe tabetindzaba labanemvume.
mt: 1. The article is about a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type. 2. The article is about a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type. 3. The article is about a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type. 4. The article is about a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type. 5. The article is about a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type. 6. The article is about a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type. 7. The article is about a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type. 8. The article is about a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type. 9. The article is about a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type. 10. The article is about a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type. 11. The article is about a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type. 12. The article is about a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type. 13. The article is about a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type. 14. The article is about a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type. 15. The article is about a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type. 16. The article is about a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type. 17. The article is about a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type. 18. The article is about a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type. 19. The article is about a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type. 20. The article is about a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type. 21. The article is about a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type. 22. The article is about a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type. 23. The article is about a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type. 24. The article is about a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type. 25. The article is about a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type. 26. The article is about a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type. 27. The article is about a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type. 28. The article is about a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type. 29. The article is about a new
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Umsebenti lomnyenti bewungasi emaphrathikhali, loluhlelo belubhalelwe kulingisa indlela iSagittarius leyenta ngayo.
mt: The accident occurred during a training flight, the cause of which is being investigated.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Lomphumela lelicembu beliwufuna ungabangelwa ngemandla lashintjashintjako emkhatsini kwetintfo letimnyama tegalaxy netintfo letimnyama teMilky Way.
mt: The galaxy is believed to be about 12 billion years old, and is one of the most distant objects ever observed.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Njengenyeti lefaka emandla emhlabeni, ibangele kunyakata kwayo, kanjalo neMilky Way ifaka emandla kuSigattarius galaxy.
mt: As the universe expands, it is also getting older, just as we are getting older on Earth. The Milky Way is also getting older, as it is part of the expanding universe.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Bososayensi bakhona kuphetsa ngekutsi tintfo letingabonakali titsikameta letinye tintfo letingabonakali ngendlela lefanako naleyo letinye tintfo letingaphili letenta ngayo.
mt: Researchers are trying to determine if the new cells are the same as the old cells or if they are new cells.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Lomtsetfo wekusebenta kwetintfo utsi tindzawo letinyenti letimnyama tetindzawo tetinkanyeti tihlala endzaweni yetinkanyezi tibe indingilizi, futsi yakhiwa tintfo letincane.
mt: 2 people were killed and 3 others were injured in a road accident involving a truck and a car in the dark early hours of the morning, and the truck caught fire.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Imibiko yakumabonakudze ikhombisa intfuntfu lemhlophe lechamuka kulendzawo yekukhicita.
mt: A white substance was found on the runway.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: Labasemagunyeni bendzawo bacwayisa bahlali labadvutane nalendzawo kutsi bahlale etindlini, bacime ema-air-conditions futsi banganatsi emanti asepompini.
mt: 12 people were injured when a bus collided with a truck, causing the bus to roll over, and the bus was without air conditioning and had no seatbelts.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Ngekusho kwebameleli benuzi e-Japan, imisebe legijima ngesivinini kanye ne-ayodini kutfolakele kutsi kusuka etitjalweni.
mt: In Japan, the government has been criticized for its slow response to the disaster.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: Labasemagunyeni basolela kutsi loku kukhombisa kutsi imiphongolo lephetse oyela we-uranium lapho ugcinwa khona udzabukile kantsi uyavuta.
mt: The report also suggests that the incident may have been caused by a faulty uranium sample.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Dokotela Tony Moll watfola luhlobo lwe-TB legwame kakhulu i-XDR. Loluhlobo lwatfolakala esifundzeni saKwazulu Natal eNingizimu Afrika.
mt: Dr. Tony Moll is a leading expert on XDR-TB. The disease is spreading in South Africa's KwaZulu-Natal province.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: Enkulumweni leyingcoco, utsite lesifo lesisha lesicishe sifane nesangaphambili "siyinkinga nakakhulu futsi siyakhatsata ngenca yelinani lelikhulu lesibulala ngalo."
mt: 2010, the world's most populous country, is "very worried" and "very concerned" about the impact of the virus on its population of 1.3 billion.
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Dkt. Moll ucabanga kutsi letinye tiguli tisitfole esibhedlela lesifo, lokungenani lababili bekutisebenti tasesibhedlela.
mt: Dr. Moll said the new test is more sensitive than current tests, which can miss up to 50 percent of cancerous cells.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
